overview: Erotic drama starring sexy actress Yu Kawakami. Every morning, Yuzuki writes a three-size note on her notebook and diets. She has been married to her husband, Masaji, the OL era seven years. What I found out after marriage was that Masashi was a hardcore sadist, a pervert with unusual obsession with women's stockings. On the weekend, Masashi buys one week's stockings and gives them to Yuzuki. Yuzuki has been wearing pantyhose for 24 hours except for baths and toilets under the order of Masashi. One night, during Masashi's selfish pantyhose play, he finds a small line on his thigh. The manager of the store, Kazuto, is called with angry anger. Masaji laughs and Kazuto bites her lips with regret, telling her to complain about this case as a scandal.
title: Frustration Married Woman Yuzuki
